description: Detects Stracciatella which executes a Powershell runspace from within C# (aka SharpPick technique) with AMSI, ETW and Script Block Logging disabled based on PE metadata characteristics.
author: pH-T (Nextron Systems)
name: HackTool - Stracciatella Execution
query: ((process.executable.text:"*\\Stracciatella.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"Stracciatella.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.Description:"Stracciatella") OR (winlog.event_data.Hashes:(*SHA256\=9d25e61ec1527e2a69d7c2a4e3fe2fe15890710c198a66a9f25d99fdf6c7b956* OR *SHA256\=fd16609bd9830c63b9413671678bb159b89c357d21942ddbb6b93add808d121a*)) OR (sha256:("9d25e61ec1527e2a69d7c2a4e3fe2fe15890710c198a66a9f25d99fdf6c7b956" OR "fd16609bd9830c63b9413671678bb159b89c357d21942ddbb6b93add808d121a")))
